trans-unit.source: Specifies settings that apply to a single, printed page.
trans-unit.target: Especifica configurações que se aplicam a uma única página impressa.

trans-unit.source: The PageSettings class is used to specify settings that modify the way a page will be printed.
trans-unit.target: A classe PageSettings é usada para especificar as configurações que modificam a maneira como uma página será impressa.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you set default settings for all pages to be printed through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DefaultPageSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você pode definir configurações padrão para todas as páginas a serem impressas por meio de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DefaultPageSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DefaultPageSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To specify settings on a page-by-page basis, handle the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings?displayProperty=fullName> event and modify the PageSettings argument included in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs> or <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs>, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar as configurações de página por página, tratar o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName>ou <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings?displayProperty=fullName>eventos e modificar o argumento PageSettings incluído na <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>ou <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs>, respectivamente.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> events, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre tratamento <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>eventos, consulte o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>Visão geral da classe.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como imprimir, consulte o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>Visão geral do namespace.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref> class using the default printer.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"> </xref> classe usando a impressora padrão.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes all fields to their default values.
trans-unit.target: O construtor padrão inicializa todos os campos com seus valores padrão.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you do not create an instance of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>, but instead use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DefaultPageSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to set settings for all pages.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você não criar uma instância de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>, mas em vez disso, use o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DefaultPageSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>para definir as configurações para todas as páginas.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DefaultPageSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref> class using a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"> </xref> classe usando uma impressora especificada.

trans-unit.source: The PageSettings constructor is similar to initializing a new instance of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> and setting the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PrinterSettings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O construtor PageSettings é semelhante ao inicializar uma nova instância da <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>e configuração de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PrinterSettings%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PrinterSettings%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"></xref> that describes the printer to use.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"> </xref> que descreve a impressora a ser usado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size of the page, taking into account the page orientation specified by the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Landscape*> property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho da página, levando em conta a orientação de página especificada pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Landscape*>propriedade.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Landscape*>

trans-unit.source: Use the Bounds property along with the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A> property to calculate the printing area for the page.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade limites junto com o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A>propriedade para calcular a área de impressão da página.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the length and width, in hundredths of an inch, of the page.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa o comprimento e a largura, em centenas de polegada, da página.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: A impressora nomeada no <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> a propriedade não existe.

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A copy of this object.
trans-unit.target: Uma cópia deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the page should be printed in color.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a página deve ser impresso na cor.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.SupportsColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine if the printer supports color printing.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.SupportsColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>para determinar se a impressora oferecer suporte a impressão de cor.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.SupportsColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the printer supports color, but you do not want to print in color, set the Color property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se a impressora oferece suporte a cores, mas você não deseja imprimir em cores, defina a propriedade de cor para `false`.

trans-unit.source: The default will be `true`.
trans-unit.target: O padrão será `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the page should be printed in color; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a página deve ser impressos em cor; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is determined by the printer.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é determinado pela impressora.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: A impressora nomeada no <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> a propriedade não existe.

trans-unit.source: Copies the relevant information from the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref> to the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVMODE " name="DEVMODE " href=""></xref>structure.
trans-unit.target: Copia as informações relevantes do <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"> </xref> especificado <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVMODE " name="DEVMODE " href=""> </xref>estrutura.

trans-unit.source: Call the CopyToHdevmode method to copy relevant information to a `DEVMODE` structure from a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>.
trans-unit.target: Chame o método CopyToHdevmode para copiar informações relevantes para um `DEVMODE` estrutura de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>

trans-unit.source: This method is useful when you want to make unmanaged Win32 calls that require a `DEVMODE`.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é útil quando você deseja fazer chamadas Win32 não gerenciadas que exigem um `DEVMODE`.

trans-unit.source: To copy information from a `DEVMODE` structure to the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>, call <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.SetHdevmode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para copiar informações de um `DEVMODE` estrutura ao <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>chame <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.SetHdevmode%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.SetHdevmode%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>

trans-unit.source: The handle to a Win32 <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVMODE" name="DEVMODE" href=""></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: O identificador do Win32 <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVMODE" name="DEVMODE" href=""> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property does not exist or there is no default printer installed.
trans-unit.target: A impressora nomeada no <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> a propriedade não existe ou não há nenhuma impressora padrão instalada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the x-coordinate, in hundredths of an inch, of the hard margin at the left of the page.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coordenada x em centenas de polegada, do disco rígida margem à esquerda da página.

trans-unit.source: The hard margin represents the physical margin set by the printer.
trans-unit.target: A margem de disco rígida representa a margem física definida pela impressora.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate, in hundredths of an inch, of the left-hand hard margin.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x, em centenas de polegada, do disco rígida margem esquerda.

trans-unit.source: Gets the y-coordinate, in hundredths of an inch, of the hard margin at the top of the page.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coordenada y em centenas de polegada, da margem rígida na parte superior da página.

trans-unit.source: The hard margin represents the physical margin set by the printer.
trans-unit.target: A margem de disco rígida representa a margem física definida pela impressora.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate, in hundredths of an inch, of the hard margin at the top of the page.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y, em centenas de polegada, da margem rígida na parte superior da página.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the page is printed in landscape or portrait orientation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a página é impresso na orientação paisagem ou retrato.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.LandscapeAngle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine the angle, in degrees, that the portrait orientation is rotated to produce the landscape orientation.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.LandscapeAngle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>para determinar o ângulo em graus, que a orientação de retrato for girada para produzir a orientação de paisagem.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.LandscapeAngle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the page should be printed in landscape orientation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a página deve ser impressa na orientação paisagem; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is determined by the printer.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é determinado pela impressora.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: A impressora nomeada no <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> a propriedade não existe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the margins for this page.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define as margens da página.

trans-unit.source: When handling the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName> event, you can use this property along with the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Bounds%2A> property to calculate the printing area for the page.
trans-unit.target: Ao lidar com o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName>eventos, você pode usar essa propriedade juntamente com o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Bounds%2A>propriedade para calcular a área de impressão da página.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Bounds%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"></xref> that represents the margins, in hundredths of an inch, for the page.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"> </xref> que representa as margens, em centenas de polegada, para a página.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1-inch margins on all sides.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 1 polegada margens em todos os lados.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: A impressora nomeada no <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> a propriedade não existe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the paper size for the page.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tamanho do papel para a página.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize> represents the size of the paper through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.Kind%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, which contains one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind> values.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize>representa o tamanho do papel por meio de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.Kind%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade, que contém uma da <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind>valores.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.Kind%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize>

trans-unit.source: Set the PaperSize property for the page to a valid <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize>, available through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSizes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: Defina a propriedade de PaperSize para a página como uma opção válida <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize>, disponível por meio de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSizes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>coleção.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSizes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize>

trans-unit.source: For information about how you can specify a custom paper size, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como você pode especificar um tamanho de papel personalizado, consulte o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize"></xref> that represents the size of the paper.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize"> </xref> que representa o tamanho do papel.

trans-unit.source: The default is the printer's default paper size.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é o tamanho de papel padrão da impressora.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property does not exist or there is no default printer installed.
trans-unit.target: A impressora nomeada no <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> a propriedade não existe ou não há nenhuma impressora padrão instalada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the page's paper source; for example, the printer's upper tray.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a fonte da página papel; Por exemplo, a bandeja da impressora superior.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource> represents the source of the paper through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.Kind%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, which contains one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind> values.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource>representa a origem do papel por meio de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.Kind%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade, que contém uma da <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind>valores.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.Kind%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource>

trans-unit.source: Set the PaperSource property for the page to a valid <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource>, available through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSources%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: Defina a propriedade de PaperSource para a página como uma opção válida <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource>, disponível por meio de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSources%2A?displayProperty=fullName>coleção.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSources%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource"></xref> that specifies the source of the paper.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource"> </xref> que especifica a origem do papel.

trans-unit.source: The default is the printer's default paper source.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é a fonte de papel padrão da impressora.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property does not exist or there is no default printer installed.
trans-unit.target: A impressora nomeada no <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> a propriedade não existe ou não há nenhuma impressora padrão instalada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounds of the printable area of the page for the printer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os limites da área de impressão da página para a impressora.

trans-unit.source: The PrintableArea property returns the correct value, whether the page orientation is landscape or portrait.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade PrintableArea retorna o valor correto, se a orientação da página é paisagem ou retrato.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to print outside the margins of the page, but within the printable area.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para imprimir fora das margens da página, mas dentro da área de impressão.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> representing the length and width, in hundredths of an inch, of the area the printer is capable of printing in.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> que representa o comprimento e a largura, em centenas de polegada, da área a impressora é capaz de impressão no.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the printer resolution for the page.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a resolução da impressora para a página.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution> represents the printer resolution of through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, which contains one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind> values.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution>representa a resolução de impressora por meio de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade, que contém uma da <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind>valores.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution>

trans-unit.source: Set the PrinterResolution property for the page to a valid <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution>, available through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterResolutions%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: Defina a propriedade de PrinterResolution para a página como uma opção válida <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution>, disponível por meio de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterResolutions%2A?displayProperty=fullName>coleção.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterResolutions%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution"></xref> that specifies the printer resolution for the page.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution"> </xref> que especifica a resolução da impressora para a página.

trans-unit.source: The default is the printer's default resolution.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é a resolução de padrão da impressora.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property does not exist or there is no default printer installed.
trans-unit.target: A impressora nomeada no <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> a propriedade não existe ou não há nenhuma impressora padrão instalada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the printer settings associated with the page.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define as configurações de impressora associadas à página.

trans-unit.source: You can use the printer settings to find default values for properties of the page that are not set.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar as configurações de impressora para localizar os valores padrão para as propriedades da página que não estão definidas.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"></xref> that represents the printer settings associated with the page.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"> </xref> que representa as configurações de impressora associadas à página.

trans-unit.source: Copies relevant information to the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref> from the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVMODE" name="DEVMODE" href=""></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Copia informações relevantes para o <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"> </xref> especificado <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVMODE" name="DEVMODE" href=""> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to copy relevant information in a `DEVMODE` structure to the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para copiar informações relevantes em um `DEVMODE` estrutura para <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>

trans-unit.source: To copy information from the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> to a `DEVMODE`, call <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.CopyToHdevmode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para copiar as informações de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>para um `DEVMODE`, chame <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.CopyToHdevmode%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.CopyToHdevmode%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>

trans-unit.source: The handle to a Win32 <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVMODE" name="DEVMODE" href=""></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: O identificador do Win32 <xref uid="langword_csharp_DEVMODE" name="DEVMODE" href=""> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The printer handle is not valid.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de impressora não é válido.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property does not exist or there is no default printer installed.
trans-unit.target: A impressora nomeada no <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> a propriedade não existe ou não há nenhuma impressora padrão instalada.

trans-unit.source: Converts the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref> to string form.
trans-unit.target: Converte o <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"> </xref> ao formulário de cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: A string showing the various property settings for the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que mostra as várias configurações de propriedade para o <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"> </xref>.
